for i in range(int(input())):
 n=int(input())
 m=list(map(int,input().split()))[:n]
 m.sort()
 t=0
 for j in range(n//2):
  t+=abs(m[j]-m[n-j-1])
 print(t)

for _ in range(int(input())):
 a=int(input())
 b=list(map(int,input().split()))
 b.sort()
 c=0
 k=a//2

n=int(input())
l=[]
for i in range(0,n):
 a=int(input())
 x=list(map(int, input().split()))
 x.sort()
 total=0
 b=a//2
 for j in range(0,b):
  total=total+abs(x[a-j-1]-x[j])
 l.append(total)
for i in l:
 print(i)

for i in range(int(input())):
 a=int(input())
 b=list(map(int,input().split()))
 b.sort()

for t in range(int(input())):
 n=int(input())
 a=sorted([int(i) for i in input().split()])
 s=0
 if n%2==0:
  i=0
  j=n-1
  while i<j:
   s+=abs(a[j]-a[i])
   j-=1
   i+=1
 else:
  s=a[n//2]
  while i<j:
   s+=abs(a[j]-a[i])
   j-=1
   i+=1
 print(s)

from fractions import Fraction
for i in range(int(input())):
 N=int(input())
 a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
 a.sort()
 su=0
 for i in range(N//2):
  su=su+abs(a[i]-a[N-1-i])
 print(su)

t = int(input())

for _ in range(t):
 n = int(input())
 
 a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
 a.sort()
 
 for i in range(n//2):
  a[i] = a[i]*(-1)
 
 print(sum(a))

for _ in range(int(input())) :
 n = int(input())
 a = list(map(int, input().split()))
 a.sort()
 sum = 0
 for i in range(n//2) :
  sum += (a[n-i-1] - a[i])
 print(sum)

for _ in range(int(input())):
 n = int(input())
 nums = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
 
 res = sum(nums[n//2:]) - sum(nums[:n//2])
 print(res)
